title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When setting the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results.
EB:
I expect the report to display different results depending on the selected Content Type property:
- When set to Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
- When set to Auto, I expect the content to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- When set to HTML, I expect some parts of the content to appear properly without HTML tags, and other parts to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Go to the dynamic text element's properties.
3. Set the Content Type property to Plain.
4. Verify that the literal content (including tags) is displayed.
5. Set the Content Type property to Auto.
6. Verify that the content appears properly without HTML or RTF tags.
7. Set the Content Type property to HTML.
8. Verify that some parts of the content appear properly without HTML tags and other parts appear literally with RTF tags.
